summary: After Zatoichi learns of his sensei's murder he uncovers a horrible conspiracy involving the local government and crime family.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Norihei Miki|Mikiko Tsubouchi|Takeshi Katô|Fujio Harumoto|San'emon Arashi|Saburô Date|Kôji Fujiyama|Jun Katsumura|Gen Kimura|Sachiko Kobayashi|Mayumi Kurata|Sônosuke Sawamura|Sampei Taira|Yûsaku Terashima
title: Zatôichi nidan-kiri
